messages.content:
Research brief: follow restaurants + new hashbrown brainstorming.

- Target brunch-forward and late-night comfort-food spots first.
- Pilot 2 SKUs: classic crispy stack + loaded signature version.
- Test a weekly 'new hashbrown' drop and track repeat orders.
messages.thinking: Scanning local research index, clustering restaurant + hash brown opportunities, then drafting concise actions.

sources.title: Hash Brown Menu Innovation Patterns
sources.snippet: Common variations: loaded hash browns, crisp texture upgrades, brunch pairings.

sources.title: Neighborhood Restaurant Follow Strategy
sources.snippet: Use neighborhood segmentation, timing tests, and repeatable social hooks.
